title: Legends, Fantasy, Science Fictions
description: This lower-division course is an introduction to the study of legends, fantasy, and/or science fiction texts. Students will analyze how works in these genres emerge from and engage with a diverse range of historical and cultural contexts, and address humanistic concerns around meaning, ethics, and humanity. This course may also examine how these genres have changed over time and how they intersect with contemporary forms of media such as film, TV, and video games.
